text: @Alyssa_Milano " this is exactly why... people stockpiling..." blah, blah...? How is people buying guns or ammo ( and you just assumed the reason is covid19) a case against stockpiling ammo? If anything it should tell us that we should have stockpiled sooner. now half the stores are closed.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
